name: Department of Transportation
description: The U.S. Department of Transportation ensures that America has the safest, most efficient and modern transportation system in the world, improving the quality of life for all American people and communities.

budget.procurementBudget: $20.5 billion in FTA funding, $12.5 billion for FAA ATC modernization

painPoints.point: Critical air traffic control crisis - 105 of 138 systems (76%) are unsustainable or potentially unsustainable, with 40 systems over 30 years old
painPoints.source: GAO-25-108162 Air Traffic Control Urgent Modernization Report March 2025

painPoints.point: 2023 national airspace shutdown due to aging ATC system outage exposed infrastructure vulnerability
painPoints.source: GAO Air Traffic Control Reports & FAA Operational Risk Assessment

painPoints.point: NextGen modernization severely delayed - originally planned for 2025 completion, now anticipated at least 2030
painPoints.source: GAO-24-105254 NextGen Delays & DOT OIG NextGen Status Report April 2024

painPoints.point: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities in FAA IT systems - unsupported software, configuration management gaps, missing software updates
Legacy analog radios over 30 years old causing frequent outages, high maintenance costs, incompatibility with modern VoIP standards
painPoints.source: Brand New Air Traffic Control System Plan May 2025

painPoints.point: STARS and ERAM disparate systems creating inefficiencies, high costs, and integration challenges requiring common automation platform
painPoints.source: FAA Terminal Flight Data Manager Report July 2024

painPoints.point: Bipartisan Infrastructure Law deployment pressure - $108 billion in transit funding requiring rapid implementation capacity
painPoints.source: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act Implementation Reports

painPoints.point: 5G spectrum interference risks, drone integration challenges, commercial spacecraft accommodation needs

IT acquisition and management challenges including project delays, budget overruns, and need for improved oversight and mature acquisition practices affecting transportation infrastructure and safety IT systems
painPoints.source: GAO High-Risk List 2025 - Improving IT Acquisitions and Management

strategicPriorities.priority: Air traffic control modernization - $12.5 billion budget with Peraton as systems integrator
strategicPriorities.source: Brand New Air Traffic Control System Plan & FAA Modernization Announcement December 2025

strategicPriorities.priority: NextGen implementation completion and Office of NextGen sunset per FAA Reauthorization Act
strategicPriorities.deadline: End of 2025 for Office of NextGen sunset

strategicPriorities.priority: Transit infrastructure deployment - $108 billion historic investment through Bipartisan Infrastructure Law
strategicPriorities.source: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act & FTA FY2025 Budget

strategicPriorities.priority: Capital Investment Grants (CIG) Program - heavy rail, light rail, streetcar, and BRT projects
strategicPriorities.source: FTA Capital Investment Grants Annual Report FY2025
strategicPriorities.funding: $4.3 billion advance appropriations FY2025, $1.6B for CIG

strategicPriorities.priority: Highway safety - Safe Streets and Roads for All (SS4A) preventing roadway deaths and serious injuries
Zero-emission transit - Low or No Emission Bus Grants for new-technology buses and fueling equipment
strategicPriorities.funding: $5.6 billion for Low/No-Emission Bus Grants, $1.1B FY2025 formula allocation

strategicPriorities.priority: Cybersecurity program enhancement - addressing unsupported software, configuration management, and software updates

insights: Air traffic control modernization represents $12.5B multi-year opportunity - Peraton awarded systems integrator role December 2025
76% of ATC systems unsustainable or potentially unsustainable - massive replacement and modernization contracts imminent
NextGen 5-year delay (2025 to 2030+) creates extended contract opportunities for aviation IT and automation
$108 billion Bipartisan Infrastructure Law transit funding through 2026 - largest federal transit investment in history
GAO identified 9 open recommendations requiring urgent FAA action - compliance and risk mitigation contracts likely
FAA Reauthorization Act 2024 mandates Office of NextGen sunset end of 2025 - organizational transformation support needed
Legacy analog radio systems over 30 years old - immediate replacement opportunity with modern digital/VoIP solutions
$5.6B Low/No-Emission Bus Grants driving zero-emission vehicle procurement and charging infrastructure
Cybersecurity gaps in USDOT IT systems - unsupported software, configuration management contracts needed
DOT Procurement Forecast available at transportation.gov/osdbu - updated annually for small business opportunities
